## Credit System (if applicable)

- [ ] Server-side operations use `enforceCreditGate`
- [ ] Client-side shows `CreditConsent` component
- [ ] Estimates show "ESTIMATE" disclaimer
- [ ] User acceptance required
- [ ] Actual credits deducted (not estimates)
- [ ] Safety buffer (1.25x) applied

## Testing

- [ ] Code compiles (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No TypeScript errors
- [ ] No linting errors
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Credit flow tested (if applicable)
- [ ] Accessibility tested
- [ ] Mobile responsive

## Accessibility

- [ ] ARIA labels present
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Screen reader tested
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG AA
- [ ] Focus indicators visible

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows existing patterns
- [ ] TypeScript types defined
- [ ] Error handling implemented
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] No breaking changes
- [ ] No console errors
